text: Now 6:33 many saw them going away and ¦ the crowds saw them going away and many TRmany saw them going away and recognized 6:33 Jesus ¦ them ANT CT PCK [Note: ECM†, NA, SBL, TH, and WH do not actually have a pronoun here, but most English translations of the critical text supply the word them because it is used earlier in the verse.]Jesus. They ran together on foot from all the 6:33 towns, got there ahead of them, and gathered around him ¦ towns and got there ahead of them CTtowns, got there ahead of them, and gathered around him.
